dbdiffchecker

Class DbConn

  • java.lang.Object
    • dbdiffchecker.DbConn
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CouchbaseConn, SQLDbConn

    public abstract class DbConn
extends java.lang.Object
    Establishes a connection with a database and runs the necessary statements to get schema information.
    Since:
    5-24-19

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DbConn()
      This is the default constructor for this class, Needed for Serialization.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void closeDatabaseConnection()
      Closes the connection to the database.
      abstract void establishDatabaseConnection()
      Makes a connection to the database using the necessary information.
      abstract java.lang.String getDatabaseName()
      Returns the name of the database to connect to.
      abstract void runStatement(java.lang.String Statement)
      Takes a statement and attempts to run it.
      protected abstract void testConnection()
      Attempts to connect to the database and responds accordingly.

                                          throws DatabaseDiffernceCheckerException

                                      throws DatabaseDiffernceCheckerException

        public abstract void runStatement(java.lang.String Statement)
                           throws DatabaseDiffernceCheckerException
        Takes a statement and attempts to run it.
        Parameters:
        Statement - The statement to run on the connected database.
        Throws:

      • testConnection

                                throws DatabaseDiffernceCheckerException
        Attempts to connect to the database and responds accordingly.

        DatabaseDiffernceCheckerException - Error attempting to connect to the database (it might be unavailable).
